titles.title: A resolution congratulating the San Antonio Spurs for winning the 2014 National Basketball Association Championship.
A resolution congratulating the San Antonio Spurs for winning the 2014 National Basketball Association Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates the San Antonio Spurs for winning the 2014 National Basketball Association Finals.
